tool_description:
Determine gender of first name, is the name male or female. 

Detect gender from email address.

we have 2.182.965 names in our database from 177 supported countries. 

detect gender from first name
name: GenderApi
title: GenderApi

api_list.name: /email

required_parameters.name: email
required_parameters.description: write email address to detect the gender

api_list.name: /api

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: Enter the first name and get gender information
